data.constraints: [[a1]] and [[a2]] do not contain space and cannot be done twice.
data.stubGenerator:
read N:int
loop N read action:string(256)
read nbOrders:int
loop nbOrders read order:string(256)
write answer
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> An integer [[N]] for the number of actions.
<<Next>> [[N]] <<lines:>> A unique action to perform.
<<Next line:>> An integer [[nbOrders]] for the numbers of precedence.
<<Next>> [[nbOrders]] <<lines:>> a line in the form [[a1]] precedence [[a2]], where precedence is either  {{before}} if action [[a1]] must be done before action [[a2]], or {{after}} if action [[a1]] must be done after action [[a2]].
data.outputDescription:
One action per line in chronological order.
If multiple actions can be done at the same time, choose the one that appears first in the intitial order.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
The program:
Given an initial list of actions to do, and a partial chronological order, ouput the actions in the right order.
INPUT:
Line 1: An integer N for the number of actions.
Next N lines: A unique action to perform.
Next line: An integer nbOrders for the numbers of precedence.
Next nbOrders lines: a line in the form a1 precedence a2, where precedence is either before if action a1 must be done before action a2, or after if action a1 must be done after action a2.

OUTPUT:
One action per line in chronological order.
If multiple actions can be done at the same time, choose the one that appears first in the intitial order.

CONSTRAINTS:
a1 and a2 do not contain space and cannot be done twice.

EXAMPLE:
Input
3
Close
Open
Pour
2
Open before Pour
Close after Pour
Output
Open
Pour
Close
